description:
Capstone project module spans over two semesters and 
is organised into two components. The first semester will 
comprise of a series of seminar-lectures that would help 
prepare students for conducting a literature review, 
working on pilot projects, and facilitating industry 
attachment for a summer internship. Starting in the first 
semester, students are required to work on a FinTech 
project. The project could be academic research, 
translational research, or software development.
title: FinTech Capstone Project
